title: Pulsefire Caitlyn
body: Does anyone know when pulsefire caitlyn will be released?? I really want this skin but there is no ETA that I know of. It would be super helpful if someone can clarify. {{champion:51}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Hey! 

We generally don't give ETAs for releases for various reasons, so the best I can give ya is that she'll be out in 7.10.
Yup! I said it's in 7.10, I'm not not specifying a particular date.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=jss7eRuK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-19T16:30:34.950+0000)
>
> We generally don't give ETAs for releases for various reasons


i would like to read some :d

The largest reason is that it doesn't confine us to a single date, so if we find a significant bug late, we have time to hotfix it before the content goes live. It also gives us some leeway room should a promo not be ready, or if we're having technical issues regarding the activation of the skin. It's rare that this happens, but it has happened, so we try to safeguard around it.

I main Cait, so it's gonna be a rough couple of weeks. People assuming I'm a noob when I pick her and that I just want to play the skin. DJ Sona made it so I couldn't play her for about three weeks. I'd pick, say "I'm really a Sona support no need to dodge," and boom dodge.

{{champion:51}}

> [{quoted}](name=Azure Hamster,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=jss7eRuK,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-05-25T14:41:43.347+0000)
>
> I main Cait, so it's gonna be a rough couple of weeks. People assuming I'm a noob when I pick her and that I just want to play the skin. DJ Sona made it so I couldn't play her for about three weeks. I'd pick, say "I'm really a Sona support no need to dodge," and boom dodge.
> 
> {{champion:51}}

To be fair, they didn't gut Sona right after releasing DJ Sona. They're going to gut Cait.

> [{quoted}](name=OtterlyLost,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=jss7eRuK,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-05-25T14:42:42.560+0000)
>
> To be fair, they didn't gut Sona right after releasing DJ Sona. They're going to gut Cait.

That shit is true.

{{champion:51}}
Ironic that Cait eats some nerfs that honestly probably guts her right before this amazing skin comes out. lol. Not saying she doesn't need to go away for a while, just poor timing.

So 1 Week after the Release of 7.10 and Pulsfire Caitlyn is still not out.
Its Kind of Sad years ago with the patch the skins came and now u wait....... and wait....... and wait and nothing happend.
Riot failed already at the Matchmaking they made the Community far more worse cause they closed the Tribunal.

i think its time to change to another Moba who tries to make it better instead of making it Pretty bad{{champion:222}}

It's gonna kill you to wait a couple of days for a skin to come out? You're going to have that skin for life, it's not going to go anywhere. Once you pick up the skin, in about a week you'll even forget that you had to wait for it to be released.

> [{quoted}](name=TrappedInLife,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=jss7eRuK,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-05-24T15:55:26.324+0000)
>
> It's gonna kill you to wait a couple of days for a skin to come out? You're going to have that skin for life, it's not going to go anywhere. Once you pick up the skin, in about a week you'll even forget that you had to wait for it to be released.

For me its just I want to play Caitlyn while she's still viable.
I know, same. But at the same time, everyone is either banning her or picking her away. Or the times that she's open either I'm not adc or someone dodges...
